      • update

        public void update(double deltaSeconds)
        When called, this should perform all necessary updates to keep the client up to date with the current state of the game. This function should only ever be called from one thread.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Client
        Parameters:
        deltaSeconds - change in seconds since the last time this function was called
